AISI SS 304 & Aluminium of Food Grade quality body construction.
With capacity of 1000 Ch/hr, 5Kg Dough hopper capacity with 1.75KW/hr & 2Kgs/hr Power and Gas consumption respectively.
Double Insulated body with Glass wool,ISI Certified Sun Beam burners of 70000 BTU/hr with pilot burners.
Baking with 2 Tier conveyor system including puffing of the chappatis.
Adjustable chappati diameter upto 150mm with wieght upto 45gms & thickness upto 3mm.
Heavy duty crompton induction assembled motor with PBL gear box system.
For Sustainable, Flexible, Hygienic & enviornment friendly use.
